title: FIGHT NIGHT
description: Fishamble: The New Play Company presents Rise Productions’ FIGHT NIGHT, a gripping journey charting the comeback of Dan Coyle Jr., a failed amateur boxer from a long line of accomplished fighters. Written by Gavin Kostick and directed by Bryan Burroughs, this play explores themes of redemption and family dynamics.
address: 59E59 Theaters – a quick block from SUBWAY 4/5/6 N/W/R at 59 St.
